title: ORACLE APEX
description: Certification exam for Oracle APEX application development

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a valid component type in Oracle APEX?
In Oracle APEX, what is a workspace?
options: A shared work environment for multiple developers

questions.text: Which statement about APEX interactive reports is true?
options: They can only be created by administrators
They allow end-users to customize the report layout
They cannot be used with RESTful data sources

questions.text: What is the primary language used for server-side processing in Oracle APEX?
Which of the following best describes APEX's architecture?
What is a 'page process' in Oracle APEX?
options: A logic that executes when a page is rendered or submitted
A JavaScript function that runs in the browser

questions.text: Which statement about APEX themes is correct?
options: Themes cannot be customized once selected
Each application can only use one theme
Themes control the visual appearance and UI behavior
Themes require separate CSS files to be uploaded

questions.text: What is the purpose of an APEX authorization scheme?
options: To control user access to application components
To authenticate users against an LDAP directory

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a valid page rendering component?
In Oracle APEX, what is a 'Dynamic Action'?
options: A PL/SQL procedure that runs on the database
A declarative way to define client-side interactivity
A special type of database trigger
A method to dynamically change the application theme

questions.text: Which of the following is true about APEX session state?
options: It can only store numeric values
It is automatically cleared when the user logs out

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of an APEX application item?
options: To store application-level values accessible across pages
To create UI elements on a page

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a benefit of using Oracle APEX?
What is the primary storage mechanism for Oracle APEX applications?
Which statement is true about the relationship between Oracle APEX and Oracle Database?
options: APEX can run on any SQL database
APEX is independent of the Oracle Database
APEX is installed as a component within Oracle Database
APEX requires a separate server from the database

questions.text: What does APEX use to handle authentication by default?
What is an APEX 'Substitution String'?
options: A way to replace placeholders with actual values

questions.text: Which feature allows end users to save their own custom reports in APEX?
What is the purpose of an APEX 'Branch'?
options: To navigate to a different page or URL
To divide the application into modules

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a valid APEX region type?
What is the function of the APEX 'Shared Components'?
options: Components that can be used in multiple pages
Components that must be modified by multiple developers
Components accessible to all users regardless of privileges

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT true about APEX plugins?
options: They extend the functionality of APEX
They can be shared across applications
They can include JavaScript, CSS, and PL/SQL

questions.text: What is APEX's 'Interactive Grid' used for?
options: Creating spreadsheet-like interfaces with editing capabilities
Defining the layout grid for responsive design
Showing geographical data on a map

questions.text: What does an APEX 'Validation' primarily do?
options: Ensure user input meets specific criteria

questions.text: In Oracle APEX, what is 'ORDS'?
Which statement about APEX page templates is true?
options: They define the HTML structure of pages
They are limited to one per application

questions.text: What is the purpose of the 'Application Builder' in APEX?
Which of the following is a valid APEX debugging tool?
What is an APEX 'Collection'?
options: A temporary data structure that can persist in a user session

questions.text: Which statement about APEX deployment is true?
options: Applications can only be deployed manually
APEX applications can be exported as SQL scripts
Applications cannot be moved between environments

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a component of the APEX architecture?
What does 'Low Code' mean in the context of Oracle APEX?
options: The application performance is lower than hand-coded applications
The code generated has low complexity
It uses a simplified programming language

questions.text: What is the function of APEX 'Computations'?
options: To perform client-side calculations with JavaScript
To assign values to items based on calculations or database queries

questions.text: Which of the following is TRUE about APEX and accessibility?
options: APEX applications cannot be made accessible
APEX automatically ensures all applications meet WCAG standards
APEX provides features to help develop accessible applications
Accessibility is only available in premium versions

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of APEX 'List of Values' (LOV)?
options: To provide data for selection items like select lists and radio groups
To list all values in a table

questions.text: What is an APEX 'Region'?
options: A geographical area in a map component
A specific area of a page that can contain content
A part of the application accessible to specific users

questions.text: Which of the following best describes APEX 'Page Zero'?
options: A page that appears before the login page
A special page that can include elements displayed on all application pages

questions.text: What are APEX 'Application Settings' used for?
Which statement about APEX security is TRUE?
options: APEX has no built-in security features
APEX provides various security features that must be properly configured
APEX security can only be implemented through third-party tools

questions.text: What is the purpose of 'Conditional Rendering' in APEX?
options: To control whether page elements are displayed based on conditions
To render pages conditionally based on browser type

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a valid page template in APEX?
What is the function of an APEX 'Process'?
options: To execute logic at specified points during page processing

questions.text: What is APEX 'Universal Theme'?
options: A theme that works on all browsers
A modern, responsive UI theme included with APEX
A theme that supports all languages
A framework for creating custom themes

questions.text: Which statement about APEX error handling is true?
options: Errors can only be handled at the application level
APEX provides no error handling capabilities
Custom error handling can be implemented at various levels
All errors are automatically sent to end users

questions.text: What is the purpose of an APEX 'Tab'?
options: To organize content within a page
To provide navigation between different pages

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a valid APEX 'Item' type?
What is an APEX 'Breadcrumb'?
options: A navigation aid showing the user's path
A method to track user navigation

questions.text: Which statement about APEX 'Tabular Forms' is true?
options: They are a legacy feature replaced by Interactive Grids
They can only display data without editing capabilities
They can only edit one row at a time

questions.text: What is the primary use of APEX 'JavaScript File URLs'?
options: To reference JavaScript libraries from CDNs
To include custom JavaScript files in the application
To redirect users to external JavaScript documentation

questions.text: Which of the following statements about APEX 'Global Notifications' is true?
options: They can only display error messages
They appear on every page of the application
They can only be configured by administrators

questions.text: What does APEX Application Express SQL Workshop allow developers to do?
options: Run PL/SQL blocks but not SQL queries
Import data from external sources only

questions.text: In APEX, what is 'Session State Protection'?
options: A feature to prevent session hijacking
A method to encrypt session data
A way to prevent URLs from being bookmarked
A mechanism to prevent tampering with session state values

questions.text: Which of the following is TRUE about APEX and REST web services?
options: APEX cannot consume REST web services
APEX can consume but not create REST web services
APEX can both consume and create REST web services
REST services can only be used with premium licenses

questions.text: What is an APEX 'Build Option'?
options: A feature that can be conditionally included/excluded from an application

questions.text: Which statement about the APEX 'Team Development' feature is TRUE?
options: It allows tracking features, bugs, and to-dos
It enables real-time collaboration between developers

questions.text: In Oracle APEX, what is a 'Navigation Bar'?
options: A horizontal list of links displayed on every page

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a type of APEX 'List'?
What does the APEX 'Application Definition' primarily include?
options: Application properties like name, theme, and global settings

questions.text: Which statement about APEX 'Static Application Files' is true?
options: They can only be image files
They can include CSS, JavaScript, images, and other web assets
They cannot be referenced from application pages

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of APEX 'Virtual Private Database' (VPD) integration?
options: To provide a private cloud environment

title: Node.js Development
description: Certification exam for Node.js application development

title: React Framework
description: Certification exam for React.js front-end development
